hero.title: Next Generation Data Privacy
hero.content: <paragraph>The HOPR protocol is built for everyone. Our mission of introducing network-level data privacy for all industries and individuals starts with you.<breakLine></breakLine><breakLine></breakLine>In becoming our valued partner, we provide you with:</paragraph>
hero.list: <list><child>Your personal project manager</child><child>A dedicated engineer for the integration of the HOPR protocol</child><child>Membership in the HOPR Association</child></list>

protocol.title: The HOPR Protocol
protocol.leftContent: <paragraph>The HOPR protocol provides network-level and metadata privacy for every kind of data exchange. A mixnet protects the identity of both sender and recipient by routing data via multiple intermediate relay hops that mix traffic.<breakLine></breakLine><breakLine></breakLine>Payments are handled via probabilistic micropayments, our custom layer-2 scaling solution on top of the Ethereum blockchain.</paragraph>
protocol.rightContent: <paragraph>Relay mix nodes are rewarded for their work in HOPR tokens. Our proof-of-relay mechanism protects everyone from dishonest behaviour.<breakLine></breakLine><breakLine></breakLine>HOPR thus provides economic incentives to run a global privacy network sustainably - and at scale - without compromising privacy.</paragraph>
